meanings.definition: A unit of measurement equal to one thousand.
meanings.sent1: She walked for milles to reach the village.
meanings.sent2: The road stretched for milles ahead.
meanings.sent3: He claimed to have eaten a milles worth of candy in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him spanned a milles in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The milles of books in the library seemed endless.

meanings.sent1: There were milles of stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The crowd cheered for milles at the concert.
meanings.sent3: She had a milles of chores to do before the party.
meanings.sent4: The milles of grains of sand on the beach sparkled in the sun.
meanings.sent5: His collection of stamps numbered in the milles.
